text: The 1976 Atlantic hurricane season started on June 1, 1976, and ended November 30, 1976. Subtropical Storm One formed before June 1, though. The only storm to remember is Hurricane Belle which caused $100 million of damage in the United States. ==Storms== *Subtropical Storm One *Tropical Depression Two *Tropical Depression Three *Tropical Depression Four *Tropical Depression Five *Tropical Storm Anna *Hurricane Belle *Hurricane Candice *Tropical Storm Dottie *Hurricane Emmy *Hurricane Frances *Tropical Depression Thirteen *Tropical Depression Fourteen *Subtropical Storm Three *Tropical Depression Sixteen *Tropical Depression Seventeen *Hurricane Gloria *Tropical Depression Twenty *Tropical Depression Twenty-One *Hurricane Holly *Tropical Depression Twenty-Three ==Storm names== * Anna * Belle * Candice * Dottie * Emmy * Frances * Gloria * Holly * * * * * * * * * * * * * ===Retirement=== None of the names from the 1976 season were retired. Category:Atlantic hurricane seasons Atlantic hurricane season Category:1970s in weather
title: 1976 Atlantic hurricane season
